mapper.select: select market_name as marketName, market_loc as marketLoc, user_name as dummy from market m left outer join (select user_no, user_name from myUser) u on m.user_no = u.user_no where market_status = 0 order by market_no desc

select notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_Date as noticeDate, market_name as dummy from notice n left outer join (select market_no, market_name from market) m on n.market_no = m.market_no where notice_status = 0 order by notice_no desc

select (select count(*) from myuser where user_auth = 'USER') || '/' || (select count(*) from myuser where user_auth = 'SELLER') || '/' || (select count(*) from myuser where user_auth = 'MANAGER') as data from dual

select * from (select rownum as pagingNum, userList.* from (select user_no as userNo , user_Auth as userAuth, user_Id as userId, user_Name as userName, user_Mail as userMail, user_Ver as userVer, user_Status as userStatus from myuser where user_auth = #{keyword} order by user_ver desc, user_no desc) userList where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount})) where pagingNum > ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount})
select count(*) from myuser where user_auth = #{keyword}

select user_no as userNo, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, user_mail as userMail, user_profile as userProfile, user_PF as userPF, user_status as userStatus, user_auth as userAuth, user_phone as userPhone, user_address as userAddress from myUser where user_no = #{userNo}

select * from (select rownum as pagingNum, marketList.* from (select market_no as marketNo, market_name as marketName, user_name as dummy, market_loc as marketLoc, market_sd as marketSD, market_ed as marketED from market m left outer join myuser u on m.user_no = u.user_no where market_status = 0) marketList where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount})) where pagingNum > ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount})
select count(*) from market where market_status = 0
